catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 165
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: family of cranes; rocks at R with white and red roses; bamboo fronds and rocks along bottom; large bamboo trees at L with peony blossoms; gold foil background
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Cranes with Bamboo (from a pair of Cranes with Pine and Bamboo)
